title: Is This a Photograph of a KKK Gathering in Mississippi?
subtitle: As protests grew following the death of a black man while in police custody in May 2020, a viral photo purported to show members of the Ku Klux Klan gathered in Mississippi.
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: A photograph shows a number of figures in white hoods ⁠— presumably belonging to the Ku Klux Klan, a white supremacy group ⁠— at a May 2020 gathering in Mississippi.
